pageContext.claim: “The dossier was a phony deal paid for by Hillary Clinton and the DNC, and used in the FISA courts, totally illegally.”
pageContext.analysis: The dossier alleging ties between Trump and Russia was compiled by a former British intelligence officer under contract with a firm hired by the Democrats and the Clinton campaign. The FBI relied on some information in the dossier to obtain a surveillance warrant on a former Trump campaign official, and the Justice Department Inspector General identified mistakes in the handling of the FISA applications. He did not say the FBI's actions were illegal or criminal and he concluded there was no bias in FBI decision-making.
